Title: Gokul's Home Page
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 06-Jan-97 19:31:35 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 1572 Last-Modified: Sunday, 01-Dec-96 02:14:58 GMT Gokul's Home Page Finally... After receiving countless flames and gripes about the excessive verbosity of my home page, I have decided to bow to the collective wish of the masses (it's a democratic world) and put only the barest minimum out here.
